values: im really sick and tired of all these scenesters, cramping the d.i.y movement, which i started, like wtf, who do these kids think they are, nobody would have heard really underground shit like rosa, if it wasnt for me, i mean i basically invented really cool bands like ____________, im so super cool, you can fill in the blank, im not gonna name drop, and like brag about my bands, besides i wouldnt want anyone to fucking see my underground shit, gah i luv to get drunk, and hide bands, inless of coarse your a hot scene chick, then ill show you whatever band you wanna see for some head, or at least a look in my direction, soo...and hawtties want some mix cds, no n00bs, i hate it when ppl ride there bike, RIDE BIKESSS only cool ppl who spit when they talk

You whiz around the corner in your rented moped when suddenly you're forced to come to a sudden stop.

It seems a funeral procession has stopped for a quick breather. Empathy overwhelms you and you offer your condolences to the whimpering man nearby. "Were you close?" you ask, wishing you hadn't.

After a moment, the man replies, "Brothers and sisters I have none, that man's father is my father's son."

That sounds sarcastic, you think to yourself. Maybe the guy doesn't want to tell you, which is fine, but there's no reason to be a smartass about it.

Or, perhaps the clever among can see this is the real answer.
